plasmapR 0.1.1
  • Reference

Plasmid Plotting Function

Source: R/plasmid_plot.R
plasmid_plot.Rd

Plotting function to create the final plasmid map from properly file.

plasmid_plot(
  arrow_df,
  labels,
  angle_adjustment,
  zoom_y,
  plasmid_name,
  font_family = "mono",
  name_size,
  bp_count = TRUE,
  curved_size,
  curve,
  label_nudge,
  label_size,
  repel_box,
  plasmid_length,
  plasmid_y = 2,
  plasmid_width = 0.1
)

Arguments

arrow_df

Dataframe of points from the create_arrow_plotting_df() function to draw arrows.
labels

List resulting from create_labels() function containing curved text dataframe and labels for annotation.
angle_adjustment

Angle (in degrees) to rotate the resulting plasmid map by.
zoom_y

Zoom level for the resulting plasmid map. Sets ylim(0,zoom_y) and can be overriden.
plasmid_name

String name for the plasmid map.
font_family

Font family to use in all of the text on the plot.
name_size

Size of the plasmid name annotation.
curved_size

Font size of the curved labels (in .pt).
curve

Curvature of the repelled text labels.
label_nudge

Amount to nudge the labels away from the plasmid arrows to allow for neater packing.
label_size

Size of the repelled labels.
repel_box

Distance to repel between the labels.
plasmid_length

Total length of the plasmid.
plasmid_y

Position on the y axis of the original plasmid.
plasmid_width

Width of the arrows of the plasmid.
